root.name: ROI blocks
root.description: Set of block (for graphical programming with Protocols) to perform different operations on ROI (Region Of Interest).
root.author: stef - Stephane Dallongeville
root.changelog:
- Version 1.2.5.1 Date 2018-03-01 10:45:32
Fixed typo in "ROI To Mask" block
- Version 1.2.5.0 Date 2017-10-18 10:38:22
Added new "Move ROI To Sequence". This block adjusts a set of ROIs coming from a source sequence for a destination sequence. ROIs are translated & scaled according to the origin position & resolution of both sequences.
- Version 1.2.4.1 Date 2017-07-06 18:08:45
(much) faster ROI filtering and sorting processing.
- Version 1.2.4.0 Date 2017-06-06 17:05:23
Added new blocks : - SortROI (sort ROIs on a specific descriptor) - SeparateROIComponents (separate connected components from ROI(s))
- Version 1.2.3.0 Date 2017-04-13 18:40:50
Added new block "get ROI descriptor value"
- Version 1.2.2.1 Date 2017-04-13 18:40:20
Added new block "get ROI descriptor value"
- Version 1.2.2.0 Date 2016-12-21 16:16:03
Fixed ROI filter block.
- Version 1.2.1.0 Date 2016-12-02 16:36:39
Fixed "filter ROI" block state loading.
- Version 1.2.0.1 Date 2016-11-16 18:48:52
Added new ROI filter bloc allowing generic filtering on any descriptor. Note than in current Icy version (1.8.6.0) the descriptor list does not display correctly but that will be fixed with Icy 1.8.7.0 or superior.
- Version 1.2.0.0 Date 2016-07-13 16:54:07
* added block to load / save ROI(s) from / to a file. * added block to specifically set ROI T/Z/C position
- Version 1.1.7.0 Date 2016-02-16 12:29:18
Boolean operation does not return anymore empty ROI on intersection when ROI are not intersecting.
- Version 1.1.6.0 Date 2016-02-10 12:42:49
fixed a typo with the 'Data type' field of 'Roi to Sequence' block.
- Version 1.1.5.4 Date 2016-01-13 16:48:42
Better dataType field in RoiToSequence block.
- Version 1.1.5.3 Date 2016-01-13 16:39:37
- added field 'dataType' to RoiToSequence block.
- Version 1.1.5.2 Date 2016-01-13 16:33:42
fixed typo with "fillValue" field in RoiToSequence block.
- Version 1.1.5.1 Date 2016-01-13 16:31:50
fixed typo in fill value field name.
- Version 1.1.5.0 Date 2016-01-13 16:01:27
- added RoiToSequence block to the bundle (old RoiToSequence plugin become deprecated). - added "fill value" field to RoiToSequence block.
- Version 1.1.4.1 Date 2016-01-05 18:41:43
added persistence for the global visible overlay (only work with a specific plugin)
- Version 1.1.4.0 Date 2016-01-04 13:11:32
Added a new "create global visible overlay" block which take a list of overlay as input and create a new Overlay which affect globally the visible property of the given input overlay list.
- Version 1.1.3.0 Date 2015-10-23 11:20:18
Better error handling for "Set ROI Name" block.
- Version 1.1.2.1 Date 2015-02-12 18:49:44
minors refactoring.
- Version 1.1.2.0 Date 2015-02-12 18:21:47
minor refactoring
- Version 1.1.1.0 Date 2015-02-12 17:56:48
changed some default parameters values
- Version 1.1.0.1 Date 2015-02-12 16:50:47
- added set ROI properties block - minors improvements - a bit of refactoring
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2015-02-12 15:55:50
Fix version informations.
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2015-02-12 15:46:34
